phobia.option: amphibians, such as frogs, newts, salamanders, etc ( atrachophobia )
bearing a deformed child or fear of monsters or deformed people ( eratophobia )
being alone or of oneself ( utophobia )
being bound or tied up ( erinthophobia )
being buried alive or of cemeteries ( aphephobia Taphophobia )
being contaminated with dirt or germs ( isophobia )
being evaluated negatively in social situations ( ocial Phobia )
being in crowded, public places like markets ( goraphobia )
being locked in an enclosed place ( leithrophobia )
being oneself or of lonliness ( remophobia )
being seen or stared at ( Scoptophobia )
being severely punished or beaten by a rod, or of being severely criticized ( habdophobia )
certain places or situations, such as stage fright ( opophobia )
challenges to official doctrine or of radical deviation ( Hereiophobia )
dark wooded areas or of forests at night ( yctohylophobia )
extreme cold, ice or frost ( ryophobia )
falling in love or being in love ( hilophobia )
fur or skins of animals ( oraphobia )
going to the doctor or of doctors ( atrophobia )
having committed an unpardonable sin or of criticism ( Enissophobia )
hearing a certain word or of names ( nomatophobia )
heights or being close to high buildings ( atophobia )
houses or being in a house ( omatophobia )
itching or of the insects that cause itching ( carophobia )
materialism or the fear of epilepsy ( ylephobia )
myths or stories or false statements ( ythophobia )
noises or voices or one's own voice; of telephones ( honophobia )
objects at the right side of the body ( extrophobia )
old people or of growing old ( erontophobia )
one that has a vile odor ( utodysomophobia )
peanut butter sticking to the roof of the mouth ( rachibutyrophobia )
poison or of being accidently poisoned ( Toxicophobia )
prescribing needed pain medications for patients ( piophobia )
rabies or of becoming mad ( yssophobia )
rain or of being rained on ( luviophobia )
rain or of being rained on ( mbrophobia )
reptiles or creepy, crawly things ( erpetophobia )
sameness, monotony or of homosexuality or of becoming homosexual ( omophobia )
seeing, thinking about or having an erect penis ( thyphallophobia )
sexual love or sexual questions ( rotophobia )
sleep or of being hypnotized ( ypnophobia )
society or people in general ( ociophobia )
speaking in public or of trying to speak ( lossophobia )
stairs, climbing, or of falling downstairs ( limacophobia )
swallowing or of eating or of being eaten ( hagophobia )
termites, insects that eat wood ( sopterophobia )
the color yellow or the word yellow ( anthophobia )
the dark or of night ( yctophobia )
things to the left or left-handed ( inistrophobia )
things to the left side of the body ( evophobia )
trains, railroads or train travel ( iderodromophobia )
undressing in front of someone ( ishabiliophobia )
ventriloquist's dummies, animatronic creatures, wax statues or anything that falsly represents a sentient being ( utomatonophobia )
vertigo or feeling dizzy when looking down ( llyngophobia )
waves or wave like motions ( Kymophobia )
